name: Temporat
description:
A rat stuck in a machine has no means to escape. Thankfully for this rat, he has special ability: his gluttony!

Eat burgers and escape the machine using your amazing time dilation powers!

Einstein discovered that time passes more slowly in a strong gravitational field.

Your rat has consumed enough cheeseburgers to develop his own tangible gravitational field! 

Features:

  • 14 levels worth of time dilation puzzles
  • Cheeseburgers
  • Chonky rat
  • Fireballs
  • Lasers
  • Cheeseburgers
  • Toggle keyboard or mouse rat controls
  • Original soundtrack
  • Cheeseburgers

This is a submission for Godot Wild Jam 37! (Theme: Inside The Machine)
Wildcards used: Time Dilation, Invisible Tutorial

Our first ever game jam! Made by nerds:

  • Thomas Beynon - Programming and design
  • Luke - Programming and design
  • Jenny Haines (@snarkylamassu) - Title / cover art
  • Harvey Carman (@carmansutra) - Music, sound, feature creep, awful 'Thank you for playing' art

Creative Commons:
https://www.piskelapp.com to create pixel animations
Laser turrets by Nineball
Munch sound
